text: "A Change Is Gonna Come" is a 1964 song by Sam Cooke. It was taken from his 11th studio album Ain't That Good News. The song is the B-side to his single Shake. It went to number 31 in the United States and went on to be used as an anthem for Civil Rights Movement. title: A Change Is Gonna Come
